attributes.action: Prevent foreign entities and individuals from donating to UK political parties.
attributes.additional_details:
Recent events have shown how vulnerable our democracy is from foreign interference, Foreign money should not be able to influence or fund any political party operating in the UK.

Political parties also should never have an advantage over another simply because they have more money.
attributes.background: Limit the amount any political party is able to receive through donations and ban any donations from individuals and entities that are not domiciled in the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Tighten the rules on political donations
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
